text:
This week we were guests at the Noordin Mews
one of George Town's newest boutique hotels

and we are going to give you a private look
at what it is like inside.

This boutique hotel has sixteen rooms and
they are all pool front.

The rooms have been very thoughtfully decorated
and they have vintage posters and photographs
of an era long gone by.
My favorite - dim sum for breakfast.

One of the things I like the most about here
is that you have both western and Asian options.
They also have some very healthy options.

I got the Muesli with yogurt and fresh fruits
and milk.

This is a comfortable place for me to get
work done right by the pool.
